channel.title: Command Help

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

Can anyone give me a command that will add to a character token and not be able to use the command for another 24 hours?
I have the basic command here:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("vote")) { player.getPackets().sendExecMessage("cmd.exe /c start " + Settings.VOTE_LINK); return true; }

All i need is the timer. I can easily add player.VotePoints += 1;

Read full topic
